price: Basi hebu angalia ulikuje mwisho wa walioonywa.
footnotes: Basi angalia, ewe uliye jaaliwa kuangalia, ulikuwaje mwisho wa walio onywa na Mitume? Bila ya shaka waliteketezwa, wakawa ni mazingatio kwa watu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
